## My Workshops
* [Intro2R](http://rpubs.com/libjohn/intro2r-dvs) -- A tidyverse workshop
* [Introduction to R](r-introduction/Intro-to-R.html) -- My quick-reference to R
* [OpenRefine](openrefine) -- A web-based, hands-on workbook supplementing the in-person workshop on data cleaning.  OpenRefine is an Open Source data science tool for data cleaning, transformation, clustering, editing, augmenting, and more
* [Regular Expressions](regex/) -- An Introduction to Regular Expressions guide for students.  This is the presentation and hands-on exercises for the in-person workshop
* [Twitter Stream Gathering](http://libjohn.github.io/twitter-gather/) -- Presentation and training materials for a non-programmer workshop on twitter stream gathering tools
* [Web Scraping](https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1QVUR3B4QDgM5fLBtFditwKyGwij0hM1qDCUL56vs34k/edit?usp=sharing) -- A Google Slides presentation and self-study workbook on how to scrape data from web sources
